content: this is a summary of a civil case heard in the panevėžys district court the court determined the division of assets in a matrimonial property case the applicant was awarded 00599 hectares of land and various household items while the defendant was awarded 015 hectares of land the court also ordered the applicant to compensate the defendant with €992950 the court referred to several articles related to matrimonial property in the civil code the applicant filed for the annulment of their marriage and requested nonpecuniary damages the court will decide on the division of property and compensation the court allowed the action and counterclaim of both parties and annulled the marriage the applicant will receive personal property and the defendant will give them a piece of land the defendant is ordered to pay the applicants legal costs and the applicant must pay the state budget for procedural costs

metadata.cost: 317.10 EUR (legal fees) + 24.70 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the defendant 496.02 EUR (stamp duty) + 24.70 EUR (court fees) to be borne by the applicant
